pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reading LSD Results (.res) Files // Interfaces R with LSD. Reads object-oriented data in results files (.res) produced by LSD and creates appropriate multi-dimensional arrays in R. Also provides functions to extract basic information and statistics from those files. LSD (Laboratory for Simulation Development) is free software developed by Marco Valente (documentation and downloads available at http://labsimdev.org).
